title: Millenary Cusco 5D/4N SURHUME

itinerary.day: Day 01: Travel to Cusco & City Tour

activities.text: Flight to Cusco.
Transfer to the selected hotel.
Breakfast.
Morning for acclimatization. We’ll explore the puma-shaped layout of Cusco, visiting the Cathedral, White Christ viewpoint, San Cristóbal lookout, Regocijo Square, San Francisco Square, and more.
Lunch.
Visit to nearby archaeological sites around the city:
Sacsayhuamán: Inca ceremonial fortress.
Q'enqo: Archaeological labyrinth for ritual use, featuring a semicircular amphitheater and underground galleries.
Pukapukara: Inca military construction.
Tambomachay: Archaeological site for water worship and Inca elite relaxation.
Arrival at the hotel.
Dinner.

itinerary.day: Day 02: Sacred Valley of the Incas - Maras, Moray & Salt Mines

activities.text: Breakfast.
Pick-up at hotel and departure to the Sacred Valley of the Incas...
Pisaq: Impressive construction from the height of the Inca Empire... features vast agricultural terraces and noble housing remains.
Urubamba: Buffet lunch in one of the best local restaurants. Then we head to Maras, Moray, and the salt mines.
Ollantaytambo: Visit to the grand fortress with its terracing and religious-administrative buildings.
Finally, visit to Chinchero: a town known for textiles and its colonial church. Hotel arrival and overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 03: Visit to the Wonder of the World 'Machu Picchu'

activities.text: Departure to Ollantaytambo.
Board the train for a 2.5-hour journey to Machu Picchu.

Breakfast and then shuttle bus to Machu Picchu. Guided 2-hour tour visiting the most important places: Temple of the Three Windows, the Sun Dial, and more. Free time afterward to explore. Return to Aguas Calientes.
Lunch.
Relaxing visit to the thermal baths of the Inca.
Dinner.
Return train to Ollantaytambo. Private transport back to Cusco.
Arrival in Cusco and overnight at hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 04: Cusco – South Valley Tour and Huasao Wetlands

activities.text: Breakfast.
Pick-up at hotel.
Visit to Tipón, an Inca ceremonial site with impressive water canals.
Visit to the Huasao wetlands with Marvel characters like Groot for photos. Lunch in Saylla.
Visit to the Pikillacta Archaeological Complex, a large Wari culture walled city.
Visit to Andahuaylillas Church, known as the 'Sistine Chapel of America' with its gold leaf-framed paintings and baroque altars.

itinerary.day: Day 05: Free Day in Cusco – Flight to Lima

activities.text: Breakfast.
Pick-up at hotel.
Visit to Pachacutec Viewpoint.
Visit to the 12-Angle Stone, San Cristobal lookout, 7 Borreguitos Street, Sapantiana Aqueduct, and San Blas Square.
Lunch.
Last souvenir shopping at artisan markets like San Pedro.
Return to origin at scheduled time.

includes: Flight Lima – Cusco – Lima. (11 kg travel backpack included)
Tourist transport by private bus in Cusco.
04 dinners as detailed in the itinerary.
01 agency staff member accompanies the group for safety and itinerary compliance.
All tours mentioned in the program, First aid kit included.
Entrance tickets to all tourist attractions.
